item.title: Developer Experience at Pinterest: The Journey to PinConsole
item.description: ð Pinterest has introduced PinConsole, an Internal Developer Platform (IDP) aimed at simplifying the developer experience. This initiative addresses increasing complexity and improves engineering velocity for over 550 million users. ð The team identified challenges such as tool fragmentation and inconsistent workflows, which were hindering productivity. By leveraging Backstage, PinConsole creates a unified interface, allowing engineers to focus on business logic. ð Early adoption shows…
